title: WIP: Student updates preview
body_html:
ref #534
new demo video here 🎧

@carpodaster @ramonh
I wanted to not interfere much with existing views and partials and not rearrange much, so came up with a way to deal with Back button in edit template (it was confusing while on preview tab). I've created student_updates_helper with links_to_student_updates method that checks if it's edit action and displays the button if so. What do you think about this?
Also I'm a bit concerned about another thing: while creating a new status update & also while previewing it, we have a Previous updates table of all the status updates below (photo). Maybe while on preview tab, only the preview of student update should be visible?
Please let me know what you think.
Thank you 🙇

body:
ref #534 
[new demo video here](https://vimeo.com/181903066) :headphones: 

@carpodaster @ramonh 
I wanted to not interfere much with existing views and partials and not rearrange much, so came up with a way to deal with `Back` button in edit template (it was confusing while on preview tab). I've created `student_updates_helper` with `links_to_student_updates` method that checks if it's `edit` action and displays the button if so. What do you think about this?
Also I'm a bit concerned about another thing: while creating a new status update & also while previewing it, we have a `Previous updates` table of all the status updates below (photo).  Maybe while on preview tab, only the preview of student update should be visible?
Please let me know what you think.
Thank you :bow:
